# Legal Notice

This page contains important legal disclaimers, license information, and terms of use for this project.

## AI-Generated Code

**Disclaimer**: This repository contains code that was partially or completely generated by an AI language model. While it has been reviewed for functionality, it may contain unforeseen errors, biases, or security vulnerabilities. Use this code at your own risk.

In no event shall the authors or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages, or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort, or otherwise, arising from, out of, or in connection with the software or the use or other dealings in the software.
